uk.ac.uea.framework

Class Share

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.uea.framework.Share

  • public class Share
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to implement the ability to share strings and images to social media. Created by Caine on 02/02/2016.

      Shares a specific string to an app that will accept it.
